services.title: Solutions
services.subtitle: Custom development services to enhance your online presence and optimize your business operations.

webDevelopment.title: Software Development
webDevelopment.description: Clean, maintainable and scalable code with a focus on best practices, performance, and robust architecture.

aiIntegration.title: AI Integration
aiIntegration.description: Implementation of OpenAI APIs, intelligent chatbots, and machine learning features.

webApplications.title: Web Applications
webApplications.description: SPAs with React/Next.js, efficient rendering, SEO optimized and smooth user experiences.

ecommerceSolutions.title: Complete E-commerce
ecommerceSolutions.description: Custom online stores with product management, shopping cart and integrated secure payments.

uiuxDesign.title: Databases
uiuxDesign.description: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB with Sequelize and Prisma ORM. Query optimization and data architecture.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What people say about working with me.

matias.name: Matias Rivarola
matias.message:
Working with Franco was a fantastic experience. He always delivered high-quality code and was willing to help his colleagues when needed. 
His reliability and dedication had a real impact on the success of our last project.

edison.name: Edison Lamar
edison.message:
Franco demonstrates exceptional attention to detail and a solid understanding of how design and development go hand in hand. 
During our collaboration, he was always open to receiving feedback and communicated clearly and respectfully.

adrian.name: Adrian Rodriguez
adrian.message:
Franco is the kind of developer every team wants â€” proactive, reflective, and reliable. 
Not only did he meet deadlines but he also contributed valuable suggestions that improved the quality of our workflow.

franklin.name: Franklin Gomez Pacoricona
franklin.message:
I had the opportunity to work with Franco on the design and development of my academy website, and it was an excellent experience. 
Franco demonstrated great mastery in React, TypeScript, CSS and SCSS, contributing creative ideas and efficient solutions. He is a reliable professional.

ismael.name: Ismael Rivarola
ismael.message:
I had the opportunity to work with Franco and I can say with complete confidence that he is an exceptional full stack developer. 
Not only does he master various technologies, both in frontend and backend, but he also has a great ability to communicate in different languages.

valentin.name: Valentin Carniel
valentin.message: I totally recommend Franco. He is very capable at solving the problems that arise and handles the languages he uses very well, he is proactive and efficient.

tomas.name: Tomas Del Pino
tomas.message:
I highly recommend Franco. We worked together building a high-availability multi-sector appointment system. 
He proved to be a key developer; his contributions with Next.js and Node.js were fundamental to ensure that the product could scale.
